dt-option.name: secondsAvailable

type.description: When this option is `null` all of the seconds are selectable.
When this option is an array, any value for the second that is in this array will be selectable and all others will not.

dt-option.default: As default all of the seconds are selectable.
dt-option.description: This option allows the user to restrict which seconds the user is able to select. Any values that are placed within the array are going to be selectable while all others will not.

example.title: Restrict the user to select either 00, 15, 30 or 45
